******************************************************************************* wayasa aw 65 ka pamana wayasathi mama kenek dinak palapala balannata aaweya.he kendraya ma athata dunneya.eya puskola janma kendrayaki.ehi wadi kotasak winasha wi thibuni.upan welawa thibu nisa ma ee anuwa palapala balimata awashya dala kendraye kotas gananaya kirima aarambha kalemi.arumayaki.ma hata kipa witakma ganan waraduni.thada hise kakkumakda ee samagama wiya.mewani deyak kisi dineka siduwi natha.ma wadaya nawatha kussiya paththata giyeya.dan amaru natha.amma kussiye wadaki.aya asalata gos tikak hurathal wi nawatha pamina kendraya sadima aarambha kalemi.menna aayith ara oluwe kakkuma,ma wadaya nawatha pamina siti pudgalaya desa baluwemi.ohuge penuma tharamak wiyaru aakarayaki.mata amuthu biyak danunada ee bawa nopenwa
